alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:32PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Polk and east central Dallas Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 332 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Merle Hay Mall, or near Johnston, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ankeny, Johnston and Clive around 335 PM CDT. Urbandale and Saylorville around 345 PM CDT. Grimes around 350 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Polk City, Granger, Saylorville Lake and Big Creek Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
